scripts.mongodump: mongodump --host 127.0.0.1:$(node config.js db.port) --username=$(node config.js db.credentials.username) --password=$(node config.js db.credentials.password) --db=$(node config.js db.name)
scripts.mongorestore: mongorestore --host 127.0.0.1:$(node config.js db.port) --username=$(node config.js db.credentials.username) --password=$(node config.js db.credentials.password) --db=$(node config.js db.name)
